span.strong:
Â All schools in Oswego County are currently closedÂ throughÂ May 15th.
AllÂ OCSD buildings are closed to the public (including students and parents).Â
If you must go into a building, please call the main office of the building before arriving so that arrangements can be made.

img.alt: our vision: fully prepared and life ready

span.span: Website Accessibility Statement -Â The Oswego City School DistrictÂ is committed to providing a website that is accessible to all members of our community. Good faith efforts are being made to ensure that our website complies with web accessibility standards. We are actively working to conform to level AA of the

a.title: W3C
a.span: World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0

span.span: . If you have difficulty accessing information on our website, please contact our

and provide the full URL (web address) of the material you tried to access, the problem you experienced, and your contact information. We will contact you and make every effort to assist you in accessing the information.
Please note that some pages contain links to third-party sites. Oswego City School District is not responsible for the content, facts, opinions or accessibility of third-party sites. To file a Section 504/ADA complaint with the district please contact the district

Â any complaint may also be referred to the U.S. Department of Education, Office for Civil Rights (OCR), 32 Old Slip, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10005, telephone (646) 428-3800 (voice) or (800) 877-8339 (TTY).
